head.title: value-keyword-case
head.description:
value-keyword-case

Specify lowercase or uppercase for keywords values.

Options

string: "lower"|"upper"

"lower"

The following patterns…

body:
#value-keyword-case

Specify lowercase or uppercase for keywords values.

    a { display: block; }
/**              ↑
 *    These values */

#Options

string: "lower"|"upper"

#"lower"

The following patterns are considered warnings:

a {
  display: Block;
}
a {
  display: bLoCk;
}
a {
  display: BLOCK;
}
a {
  transition: -WEBKIT-TRANSFORM 2s;
}

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

a {
  display: block;
}
a {
  transition: -webkit-transform 2s;
}

#"upper"

The following patterns are considered warnings:

a {
  display: Block;
}
a {
  display: bLoCk;
}
a {
  display: block;
}
a {
  transition: -webkit-transform 2s;
}

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

a {
  display: BLOCK;
}
a {
  transition: -WEBKIT-TRANSFORM 2s;
}
